TopicTitle: Parachutes are fully deployed, but do not slow down the vessel at all

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: win 10 | CPU: i5-4460 | GPU: geforce gtx 1660 | RAM: 16GB

 

Ended a mission that saw no acceleration from the parachute. Interestingly the capsule splashed down at around 800 m/s and survived. Visually the parachute was fully deployed well before splashdown. Three parts the small pod, heat shield and small parachute. I did have custom deployment settings.

Edited December 20, 2023 by The Space Peacock
